title.en: An Aspiration Encapsulating the Key Points of the Oral Instructions

text.en: Root guru, precious and most kind,
text.en-trans: lumé ten gyi kyab chik khorlö gön

text.en: Lord of the mandala,Sole, unfailing, lasting refuge,
text.en-trans: drinchen tsawé lama rinpoche

text.en: With your compassion, take hold of me:Working only for this life, not keeping death in mind,
text.en-trans: chiwa ma dren tsé di drubpa yi

text.en: Wasting this free, well-favored human birth.
text.en-trans: daljor tong zé dak la tukjé zung

text.en: Human life, lasting an instant, like a dream—
text.en-trans: milam drawé mitsé yé yü di

text.en: It might be happy; it might be sad.
text.en-trans: kyi kyang rung la duk kyang rungwé na

text.en: Not wishing for joy; not avoiding sadness,
text.en-trans: kyiduk né la yimön mi jepar

text.en: May I truly practice the sublime teachings.
text.en-trans: dampé chö la nenten jepar shok

text.en: This human life, like a butter-lamp set out in the wind—
text.en-trans: lung seb marmé drawé mitsé di

text.en: It might last a long time, or it might not.
text.en-trans: ring yang rung la tung yang rungwé na

text.en: Not letting ego's hold tighten further,
text.en-trans: dakdzin dampor kha nön mi debpar

text.en: May I truly practice the sublime teachings.
text.en-trans: dampé chö la nenten jepar shok

text.en: A life of luxury, like a bewitching apparition—
text.en-trans: lu jé gyuma drawé namchö di

text.en: It might come to pass, or it might not.
text.en-trans: drik kyang rung la ma drik kyang rungwé

text.en: With the ways of the eight worldly dharmas cast away like chaff,
text.en-trans: chö gyé khyer ka tsa tar dor né su

text.en: May I truly practice the sublime teachings.
text.en-trans: dampé chö la nenten jepar shok

text.en: All these underlings, like a bunch of birds in a tree—
text.en-trans: shing kheja tsok drawé khoryok di

text.en: They might surround me; they might not.
text.en-trans: dü kyang rung la dral yang rungwé na

text.en: Not letting others lead me around by the nose,
text.en-trans: natak rang gi go la triwa yi

text.en: May I truly practice the sublime teachings.
text.en-trans: dampé chö la nenten jepar shok

text.en: This illusory body, like a rotting, hundred-year-old house—
text.en-trans: lo gyé khang rul drawé gyulü di

text.en: It might last; it might fall into dust.
text.en-trans: tso yang rung la gyel yang rungwé na

text.en: Not caught up in efforts to get food or clothes or medicines,
text.en-trans: zegö men gyi tsolwé mi chingwar

text.en: May I truly practice the sublime teachings.
text.en-trans: dampé chö la nenten jepar shok

text.en: This dharma behavior, like a child's game—
text.en-trans: jipé tsemo drawé chö tsuk di

text.en: It might go on, or it might stop.
text.en-trans: zin yang rung la shor yang rungwé na

text.en: Undeceived by things that don't really matter,
text.en-trans: zar zir mangpö rang go mi korwar

text.en: May I truly practice the sublime teachings.
text.en-trans: dampé chö la nenten jepar shok

text.en: All these gods and spirits, like a mirror's reflections—
text.en-trans: melong zuknyen drawé lha dré di

text.en: They might give help; they might do harm.
text.en-trans: pen yang rung la nö kyang rungwé na

text.en: Not seeing my own deluded visions to be enemies,
text.en-trans: rangnang trulpa dra ru mi tawar

text.en: May I truly practice the sublime teachings.
text.en-trans: dampé chö la nenten jepar shok

text.en: All this confused chatter, traceless as an echo—
text.en-trans: jemé drakcha drawé trul tam di

text.en: It might be interesting, or it might not.
text.en-trans: nyen kyang rung la ma nyen kyang rungwé

text.en: With the Three Jewels and my own mind bearing witness,
text.en-trans: könchok sum dang rangsem pang zhak né

text.en: May I truly practice the sublime teachings.
text.en-trans: dampé chö la nenten jepar shok

text.en: Things that, like a deer's antlers, may prove useless in a time of real need—
text.en-trans: shawé ra dra gö dü mi penpa

text.en: I might know them, or I might not.
text.en-trans: shé kyang rung la ma shé kyang rungwé

text.en: Not placing my confidence merely in the arts and sciences,
text.en-trans: rikné tsam la lo té mi chawar

text.en: May I truly practice the sublime teachings.
text.en-trans: dampé chö la nenten jepar shok

text.en: These gifts and money given by the faithful, like deadly poison—
text.en-trans: tsen duk hala drawé kor dzé di

text.en: I might receive them; I might not.
text.en-trans: jung yang rung la ma jung yang rungwé

text.en: Not spending my life trying to accumulate evil earnings,
text.en-trans: loktsö dik la mitsé mi kyalwar

text.en: May I truly practice the sublime teachings.
text.en-trans: dampé chö la nenten jepar shok

text.en: This lofty station, like dogshit wrapped up in satin—
text.en-trans: khyi lü dar tum drawé ché zuk di

text.en: I might have it; I might not.
text.en-trans: tob kyang rung la ma tob kyang rungwé

text.en: Knowing my own rottenness at first hand,
text.en-trans: rang go rulwa na yi tsor né su

text.en: May I truly practice the sublime teachings.
text.en-trans: dampé chö la nenten jepar shok

text.en: Friends and family, like travellers who come together for a fair—
text.en-trans: tsongdü drönpo drawé nyen drel di

text.en: They might be vicious; they might be loving.
text.en-trans: dza yang rung la khön kyang rungwé na

text.en: Cutting attachment's tough cord from the heart,
text.en-trans: zhenpé dö tak nying né chepa yi

text.en: May I truly practice the sublime teachings.
text.en-trans: dampé chö la nenten jepar shok

text.en: All these possessions, like the wealth found in a dream—
text.en-trans: milam nor nyé drawé zangzing di

text.en: I might own them; I might not.
text.en-trans: yö kyang rung lamé kyang rungwé na

text.en: Not using tact and flattery to turn others' heads
text.en-trans: tün juk ngo gé zhen go mi korwar

text.en: May I truly practice the sublime teachings.
text.en-trans: dampé chö la nenten jepar shok

text.en: This rank in the hierarchy, like a tiny bird perched on a branch—
text.en-trans: ji'u chung shing tser bab dré gosa di

text.en: It might be high; it might be low.
text.en-trans: to yang rung la ma yang rungwé na

text.en: Without making myself miserable wishing for a better position,
text.en-trans: rang duk né la yimön mi jepar

text.en: May I truly practice the sublime teachings.
text.en-trans: dampé chö la nenten jepar shok

text.en: Practicing the spells of black magic, like deadly weapons—
text.en-trans: tsön cha drawé ngen ngak lé jor di

text.en: I might be able to cast them, or I might not.
text.en-trans: drub kyang rung la ma drub kyang rung sawé

text.en: Not buying the knife that cuts my own throat open,
text.en-trans: rang sokchöpé pudri mi nyowar

text.en: May I truly practice the sublime teachings.
text.en-trans: dampé chö la nenten jepar shok

text.en: Doing prayers, like a parrot saying 'om mani peme hung'—
text.en-trans: né tsö yik druk drawé dön jö di

text.en: I might do them; I might not.
text.en-trans: jé kyang rung la ma jé kyang rungwé

text.en: Without boasting about whatever I do,
text.en-trans: jé jé mangpö namdrang mi drangwar

text.en: May I truly practice the sublime teachings.
text.en-trans: dampé chö la nenten jepar shok

text.en: The way one teaches the dharma, like flowing water—
text.en-trans: riwö babchu drawé shé yam chö

text.en: I might be expert, or I might not.
text.en-trans: khé kyang rung la ma khé kyang rungwé

text.en: Without thinking that mere eloquence is dharma,
text.en-trans: kha shé khé la chö su mi gompar

text.en: May I truly practice the sublime teachings.
text.en-trans: dampé chö la nenten jepar shok

text.en: Intellect that makes quick discriminations, like a rooting pig—
text.en-trans: pakpé na dra chepa nyurwé lo

text.en: It might be dull; it might be sharp.
text.en-trans: no yang rung la tul yang rungwé na

text.en: Not allowing the barbs of pointless anger and attachment to arise,
text.en-trans: dönmé chakdang zekma mi longwar

text.en: May I truly practice the sublime teachings.
text.en-trans: dampé chö la nenten jepar shok

text.en: Meditation experiences, like well-water in summer—
text.en-trans: yar gyi ka chu drawé naljor nyam

text.en: They may increase; they may lessen.
text.en-trans: pel yang rung la drib kyang rungwé na

text.en: Without doing as children do, chasing after rainbows,
text.en-trans: jipa jatsön jesu mi depar

text.en: May I truly practice the sublime teachings.
text.en-trans: dampé chö la nenten jepar shok

text.en: This pure perception, like rain on a mountaintop—
text.en-trans: ri gö charpa drawé daknang di

text.en: It might arise, or it might not.
text.en-trans: shar yang rung la mashar yang rungwé

text.en: Without taking deluded experience to be real,
text.en-trans: trulpé nyam la denpar mi zungwar

text.en: May I truly practice the sublime teachings.
text.en-trans: dampé chö la nenten jepar shok

text.en: These freedoms and favorable conditions, like a wishing-jewel—
text.en-trans: yizhin norbu tabü daljor di

text.en: If they are lacking, there is no way to accomplish the holy dharma.
text.en-trans: ma tob damchö drubtab mi dukpé

text.en: Not throwing away what's already in my own hand,
text.en-trans: rang lak yö dü chüzö mi tongwar

text.en: May I truly practice the sublime teachings.
text.en-trans: dampé chö la nenten jepar shok

text.en: The glorious guru, like a lamp that lights the way to liberation—
text.en-trans: tarlam drönmé palden lama di

text.en: If I cannot meet him, there is no way to realize the true nature.
text.en-trans: ma jal neluk tok tab mi dukpé

text.en: Not jumping off a cliff when I know the path to go on,
text.en-trans: gar dro shé dü yang la mi chongwar

text.en: May I truly practice the sublime teachings.
text.en-trans: dampé chö la nenten jepar shok

text.en: The holy dharma, like a medicine to cure disease—
text.en-trans: né sel men dang drawé damchö di

text.en: If I don't hear it, there is no way to know what should be done and not done.
text.en-trans: ma tö panglang shé tab mi dukpé

text.en: Not swallowing poison when I can tell benefit from harm,
text.en-trans: pennö shé dü tsen duk mi gampar

text.en: May I truly practice the sublime teachings.
text.en-trans: dampé chö la nenten jepar shok

text.en: The changing cycle of joy and sorrow, like the changing seasons—
text.en-trans: yar gün ré dré kyiduk gyur dok di

text.en: If this isn't seen, there is no way to achieve renunciation.
text.en-trans: ma tong ngepar jung tab mi dawé

text.en: As it's sure that a time of suffering will come round to me,
text.en-trans: duk ré rang la khorwar takchö né

text.en: May I truly practice the sublime teachings.
text.en-trans: dampé chö la nenten jepar shok

text.en: Samsara, like a stone fallen deep into water—
text.en-trans: chu do chu ting jing dré khorwa di

text.en: If I don't get out now, I won't get out later.
text.en-trans: daré ma kyur chi né mi tarwé

text.en: Pulling myself out by the rope of the compassionate Three Jewels,
text.en-trans: könchok tukjé ché tak la jü né

text.en: May I truly practice the sublime teachings.
text.en-trans: dampé chö la nenten jepar shok

text.en: Liberation's good qualities, like an island of jewels—
text.en-trans: norbü ling dra tarwé yönten di

text.en: If they aren't known, there is no way to begin to make efforts.
text.en-trans: ma shé tsöndrü tsom tab mi dukpé

text.en: Having seen the advantage of permanent victory,
text.en-trans: tendu gyalwé khé sang tong né su

text.en: May I truly practice the sublime teachings.
text.en-trans: dampé chö la nenten jepar shok

text.en: The life stories of the great masters, like the essence of amrita—
text.en-trans: dütsi chü dra dampé namtar di

text.en: If they aren't known, there is no way for confidence to arise.
text.en-trans: ma jal yiché kyé tab mi dukpé

text.en: Not choosing self-destruction when I can tell victory from defeat,
text.en-trans: pam gyal shé dü rang duk mi nyowar

text.en: May I truly practice the sublime teachings.
text.en-trans: dampé chö la nenten jepar shok

text.en: Bodhicitta, like a fertile field—
text.en-trans: zhingsa shinpo drawé changsem di

text.en: Until it is born, there is no way to achieve enlightenment.
text.en-trans: makyé sangye tob tab mi dukpé

text.en: Not staying idle when there is a great aim to be accomplished,
text.en-trans: dön chen drub la tangnyom mi jokpar

text.en: May I truly practice the sublime teachings.
text.en-trans: dampé chö la nenten jepar shok

text.en: My own mind, like a monkey's nonsense—
text.en-trans: chol chung pé'u drawé rangsem di

text.en: Without keeping guard, there is no way to avoid the conflicting emotions.
text.en-trans: ma sung nyönmong pang tab mi dukpé

text.en: Not acting without restraint, like a lunatic,
text.en-trans: nyönpé lemo chi der mi jepar

text.en: May I truly practice the sublime teachings.
text.en-trans: dampé chö la nenten jepar shok

text.en: Ego, like a shadow one is born with—
text.en-trans: lhenkyé dribma drawé dakdzin di

text.en: Until it's abandoned, there is no way to reach a place of real joy.
text.en-trans: ma pang dé sar chin tab mi dukpé

text.en: When the enemy is in my clutches, why treat him as a friend?
text.en-trans: drawo zin dü shé su mi tenpar

text.en: May I truly practice the sublime teachings.
text.en-trans: dampé chö la nenten jepar shok

text.en: The five poisons, like hot embers among ashes—
text.en-trans: tal seb medak drawé duk nga di

text.en: Until they're destroyed, one can't remain at rest in the natural state.
text.en-trans: ma chom semnyi nal du mi nepé

text.en: Not raising baby vipers in my pockets,
text.en-trans: dukdrul trugu rum du mi sowar

text.en: May I truly practice the sublime teachings.
text.en-trans: dampé chö la nenten jepar shok

text.en: This mindstream, like the tough hide of a butter-bag—
text.en-trans: num kok gyongpo drawé ranggyü di

text.en: If it's not tamed and softened, one can't mix mind with dharma.
text.en-trans: ma dul chö dang rangsem mi drewé

text.en: Without spoiling the child that is born of itself,
text.en-trans: rang kyé trugu kyak lang mi tangwar

text.en: May I truly practice the sublime teachings.
text.en-trans: dampé chö la nenten jepar shok

text.en: These ingrained bad habits, karmic traces, like the strong currents of a river—
text.en-trans: chulung bab dra bakchak ngen gom di

text.en: If they aren't cut, one can't avoid acting contrary to dharma.
text.en-trans: ma ché chö min chö dang mindral wé

text.en: Without selling weapons to my enemies,
text.en-trans: tsöncha drawö lak tu mi tsongwar

text.en: May I truly practice the sublime teachings.
text.en-trans: dampé chö la nenten jepar shok

text.en: These distractions, like never-ending waves—
text.en-trans: zinmé chu nyer tabü namyeng di

text.en: If they aren't given up, there is no way to become stable.
text.en-trans: ma pang tenpa tob tab mi dawé

text.en: When I can do as I like, why practice samsara?
text.en-trans: chi jé chok dü khorwa mi drubpar

text.en: May I truly practice the sublime teachings.
text.en-trans: dampé chö la nenten jepar shok

text.en: The lama's blessings, like spring warming up soil and water—
text.en-trans: sa chu drö dra lamé jinlab di

text.en: If they don't enter into me, there is no way to be introduced to the nature of mind.
text.en-trans: ma zhuk rang ngotrö tab mi dawé

text.en: When there is a short-cut, why take the long way round?
text.en-trans: nyelam leb dü sa gyami korwar

text.en: May I truly practice the sublime teachings.
text.en-trans: dampé chö la nenten jepar shok

text.en: This retreat in the wilderness, like summer in a lush place where herbs grow—
text.en-trans: yar gyi men jong drawé wen sa di

text.en: If I don't remain here, there is no way for good qualities to be born.
text.en-trans: ma ten yönten kyé tab mi dawé

text.en: When staying high up in the mountains, don't drift back down into low towns.
text.en-trans: ri la nedü drong nak mi drimpar

text.en: May I truly practice the sublime teachings.
text.en-trans: dampé chö la nenten jepar shok

text.en: Desire for pleasure, like a bad-luck spirit entering the house—
text.en-trans: sé rak puk su zhuk dré kyi dö di

text.en: If I'm not free of it, I'll never stop working toward suffering.
text.en-trans: ma tral dukngal tsoldrub michepé

text.en: Not making offerings to voracious ghosts as my personal gods,
text.en-trans: tok gong puk gi lha ru mi chöpar

text.en: May I truly practice the sublime teachings.
text.en-trans: dampé chö la nenten jepar shok

text.en: Mindfulness, like the lock on a castle gate—
text.en-trans: khar gyi go chak drawé dren shé di

text.en: If it is lacking, one can't stop the movements of illusion.
text.en-trans: ma ten trulpé gyundrul michepé

text.en: When the thief is surely coming, why forget to bar the door?
text.en-trans: künma yong dü go cha mi löpar

text.en: May I truly practice the sublime teachings.
text.en-trans: dampé chö la nenten jepar shok

text.en: The true nature, unchanging, like the sky—
text.en-trans: gyurmé namkha tabü neluk di

text.en: Until it's realized, one can't completely resolve doubts as to the view.
text.en-trans: ma tok tawé zhi tsa mi chöpé

text.en: Not letting myself be chained by theories
text.en-trans: rang gi rangnyi chak su mi chukpar

text.en: May I truly practice the sublime teachings.
text.en-trans: dampé chö la nenten jepar shok

text.en: Awareness, like a flawless piece of crystal—
text.en-trans: drimé shelgong drawé rigpa di

text.en: Until it's seen, intentional meditation cannot dissolve.
text.en-trans: ma tong gompé dzin tsol mi zhikpé

text.en: When there's an inseparable companion, why go off looking for another?
text.en-trans: dralmé drok dü zhen la mi tsolwar

text.en: May I truly practice the sublime teachings.
text.en-trans: dampé chö la nenten jepar shok

text.en: The face of ordinary mind, like an old friend—
text.en-trans: ngar dri drok dra tamal shepé ngo

text.en: If it's not seen, all that one does is misleading.
text.en-trans: ma trö jé tsé luwé chö yinpé

text.en: Without groping in the darkness of my own closed eyes,
text.en-trans: mik bu tsum né par tsö mi jepar

text.en: May I truly practice the sublime teachings.
text.en-trans: dampé chö la nenten jepar shok

text.en: In short, without giving up this life's preoccupations,
text.en-trans: dorna tsé di jawa ma tang na

text.en: There's no way to accomplish the sacred teachings after death.
text.en-trans: chimé damchö drub tab mi dawé

text.en: Having decided to show myself great kindness,
text.en-trans: rang drin rang la chewa drö tab né

text.en: May all that I do be toward the dharma.
text.en-trans: jé tsé dampé chö su drowar shok

text.en: May I not have wrong views toward the lama who, in accord with the dharma, has given instruction.
text.en-trans: chö zhin dam na lamar lokta dang

text.en: May I not lose faith in the yidam when misfortunes occur.
text.en-trans: lé ngen lhong tsé lha la yiché dang

text.en: May I not put off practice when circumstances are hard.
text.en-trans: galkyen jung na drubpa sholwa sok

text.en: May there be no obstacles to attaining siddhi.
text.en-trans: ngödrub tob kar barché magyur chik

text.en: All these activities are pointless, like making a grand tour of a wasteland.
text.en-trans: jé tsé tamché dönmé satong kor

text.en: All this trying just makes my mindstream more rigid.
text.en-trans: bé tsé tamché ranggyü rengpé gyu

text.en: All this thinking only adds on confusion to confusion.
text.en-trans: dren tsé tamché trulpé kha nön tab

text.en: All that passes for dharma to ordinary people only makes for further binding.
text.en-trans: sokyé chö su lom kün rang ching gyu

text.en: So much activity; nothing comes of it.
text.en-trans: ja gyu mang la drub dré chik kyangmé

text.en: So much thinking; no point to it.
text.en-trans: dren gyu mang la teso chiyang mé

text.en: So much wanting; no time for it.
text.en-trans: gö gö mang la dzom dü mepa yi

text.en: Having given this up, may I be able to practice according to instructions.
text.en-trans: jawa tang né damngak gom nü shok

text.en: If I must do something—let Buddha's teachings bear it witness.
text.en-trans: ja o sam na gyal sung pangpor tsuk

text.en: If I must do something—mix mindstream and dharma.
text.en-trans: jé do sam na ranggyü chö dang sé

text.en: If I must accomplish something—read the life stories of past masters.
text.en-trans: drubwo sam na gongmé namtar tö

text.en: What's the use of other things? Spoiled brat!
text.en-trans: lang shor khyö la jawa zhen gyi chi

text.en: Take a low seat, and become rich with contentment.
text.en-trans: men sa zin ching chok shé nor gyi chuk

text.en: Try hard to get free of the eight worldly dharmas.
text.en-trans: chö gyé ching drol drub la nyingrü sa

text.en: May the lama's blessings enter into me;May my realization become equal to the sky.
text.en-trans: lamé jin zhuk tokpa kha dang nyam

text.en: Grant blessings that I may reach Kuntuzangpo's throne.
text.en-trans: kunzang gyalrab zinpar jingyi lob
